Sentencas: The effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite was studied for use as an interconnect material in high temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite

Sentencas: The compositions of Y0.8Ca0.2Cr1-xNixO3 +/-delta(x = 0-0.15), prepared using the glycine nitrate process, showed single phase orthorhombic perovskite structures over a wide range of oxygen partial pressures (4.6 x 10(-20) atm <= pO(2)<= 0.21 atm at 900 degrees C).
Titulo: Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis indicated that most of the nickel ions replacing chromium ions are divalent and act as acceptor dopants, leading to a substantial increase in conductivity.
Titulo: Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite

Sentencas: In particular, the conductivity at 900 degrees C in air increased from 10 S/cm to 34 S/cm with 15% nickel substitution, and an increase in charge carrier density was confirmed by Seebeck measurements, which validated the predominant Ni2+ oxidation state.
Titulo: Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite

Sentencas: A point defect model was derived, and the relationship between electrical conductivity and oxygen partial pressure was successfully fitted into the proposed model.
Titulo: Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite

Sentencas: The defect modeling results indicated that nickel substitution improves the stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite toward reduction and suppresses the oxygen vacancy formation, which results in significantly increased electrical conductivity in reducing environment.
Titulo: Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of Y0.8Ca0.2Cr0.85Ni0.15O3 +/-delta at 900 degrees C in reducing atmosphere (pO(2)=10(-17) atm) was 5.8 S/cm, which was more than an order of magnitude higher than that of Y0.8Ca0.2CrO3 +/-delta (0.2 S/cm).
Titulo: Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite

Sentencas: Improved stability in reducing atmosphere was further confirmed by dilatometry measurements showing reduced isothermal chemical expansion, and the isothermal expansion in reducing atmosphere (pO(2)=10(-17) atm) at 900 degrees C decreased from 0.07% for Y0.8Ca0.2CrO3 +/-delta to 0.03% for Y0.8Ca0.2Cr0.85Ni0.15O3 +/-delta.
Titulo: Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite

Sentencas: Based on these results, enhanced electrical performance and mechanical integrity is expected with nickel substitution on calcium-doped yttrium chromite in SOFC operating conditions.
Titulo: Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite
Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite
Effect of nickel substitution on defect chemistry, electrical properties, and dimensional stability of calcium-doped yttrium chromite
